name: 華國媛
objective: 本課程包含用於人體之體內和體外的材料。體內材料包含藥物釋放裝置、人工皮膚、人工血液等。體外的材料包含診療用材料、透析膜、人工肺等。
schedule:
Week　　Title
1.　　　　Introduction
2.　　　　Bioorganic polymers- DNA, protein, polysaccharide  & lipid
3.　　　　Tissues, organs, and human body
4.　　　　Synthetic bioorganic polymers
5.　　　　Analysis on biocompatibility &biodegradability
6.　　　　Regulation on medical device
7.　　　　Analysis on carcinogenicity and toxicity
8.　　　　Tissue Engineering I- introduction of ECM
9.　　　　Mid-term group presentation (35%)
10.　　　　Tissue Engineering II- Cell growth and Scaffold
11.　　　　Artificial Skin Tissue- Integra & Apligraf
12.　　　　Nanoparticle in drug delievery
13.　　　　Artificial Organ- lung
14.　　　　Taiwan biomedical device-company case
15.　　　　Case report presentation
16.　　　　Case report Summary (50%)
scorePolicy:
Class attendance (40%)
Midterm Exam: Oral Presentation (30%):
Final Exam: Case Report (30%):
materials: Biomaterials Science: An Introduction to Materials in Medicine by Buddy D. Ratner, Allan S. Hoffman, Frederick J. Schoen, Jack E. Lemons, Academic Press, 2rd edition (2004).
